[h1] This Company Is Not Worth Your Money [/h1]
They essentially scrapped everything they promised for PvE and downgraded the game and are SLOWLY reintroducing aspects of the first game and calling them "Updates".
While the game play is still there, the greed overshadows everything else.

没什么想多说的，从守望16年刚出的时候就被这款游戏吸引了，奈何当时没电脑玩不了，但总是刷守望的视频解解馋，在21有幸终于接触了这款游戏，也享受到了最后的时光，最大的遗憾就是铁拳改了，不能曹飞安娜了，之后国服也没了，我枪法很差，但在自定义的铁拳跑酷里找到了属于我的快乐，在铁拳跑酷里我见识到了那些跑酷大佬天马行空的点位和想象力，还有那些优质的跑酷地图，我跑酷水平也只能算中下，也尝试做过图，也受到过辱骂，但也受到过表扬和赞赏，唉没什么想多说的了，如果可以许可愿望，我希望国服回来，守望先锋1回来，铁拳的上勾拳回来，最后祝考迪克好似。

Я покупал эту игру еще без цифры 2 в названии, наиграно более 3000 часов. Как можно убить игру, которая была шедевром? Как оказалось очень легко. Нужно всего лишь перестать поддерживать игру много лет и в итоге ничего не сделать. Ладно, они обещали вторую часть, которая будет намного лучше и вообще бомба. НО это просто катастрофа... Бесплатная игра? В которой продаются скины (большинство из них старые скины или реколоры какие-то) за большие деньги!, батлпас вообще смешной, обещанного пве просто не будет (просто миссии как были в ов1 бесплатно, короткие и не реиграбельные)... Они как будто перестали слышать игроков. После всего полученного г*вна после долгого ожидания навязывается вопрос: что они делали все это время, если в итоге просто отказались от всего, над чем они якобы столько лет работали?? Наверное, готовились все годы к лгбтк+... Это ужасно. OW 2 это все еще тот самый старый OW 1. Они просто паразитируют на наследии, кормят обещаниями и просто уничтожают и закапывают компанию которая считалась чуть ли не эталоном геймдева... Печально...

In the echoing halls of digital spheres,
Rises Overwatch 2, seeking to revere.
Yet, oh, what once shimmered bright and clear,
Now fades like a vanishing constellation's tear.

The developers, once masters of their craft,
Now seem lost, wandering a somber draft.
Promises to forge a new era and spark,
Dwindle like candles on paths dim and dark.

A game, once vibrant, brimming with life's zest,
Is now tainted by greed's turbulent crest.
The souls of heroes, once noble and true,
Lose themselves in microtransactions, it's true.

Oh, Overwatch 2, what have you become?
A shadow of self, battles left undone.
The fans, hopeful for magic and radiant grace,
Find only the monetarist's cold embrace.

In a world where heroic tales were spun,
Players now mournful, feeling undone.
Love for art, for storytelling they mourn,
As loot boxes, voracious, are greedily borne.

Perhaps rescue still lingers, yet afar,
Till then, hearts remain sorrowful, ajar.
Overwatch 2, oh, what a melancholic plight,
A game fading away, like a pale star's light.

Overwatch 2 is a shell of a game it used to be. It died the day that Blizz said that they weren't going to do the pve expansion. This is a desperate money grab attempt.

THIS REVIEW IS NOT AGAINST THE GAME, BUT FOR THE DEVELOPERS AND BLIZZARD

I have been with Overwatch since the first games release. It was something back then, but now it is a shell of what it once was. As much I as I enjoy the PvE content, regardless of the duration, it was not what was promised back when Overwatch 2 was announced. The game play itself is fine, balancing is and will always be an issue with multiplayer PvP games and there is nothing that the player base can do about it. The Current Dev team seems out of touch with the community and the fan base. But is still shows that if a new cinematic comes out people with flock back to watch it again, play for a bit, then return to the game they left previously. I know, because I am one of those people. 

Most of the issues are because of the higher ups at blizzard, the Devs do what they are able to do. However, The release of Baldur's Gate 3 has proven to people that AAA game studios prefer this: Money>Quality. The issues with Blizzard are another thing entirely, the Harassment suit being the big one, which people do not forget, but the Old Crones that seem to control blizzard want you to forget. I still remember when people called this game a TF2 killer, yet all I see is a game that is rotting away, while one of its inspirations is thriving  again thanks to 1 Summer update, An Australian Man and a Seal.

I do have one other thing to say about this game and that is that it is still a game that you can play, and DO NOT throw hate at the game, But the Developers and Especially Blizzard need to understand that the review bombing is not about the game, it is about them.

It is super sad how they are milking this game, I'm okay with paying for battle passes and skins really. I do buy stuff in a lot of games, but overwatch prices are waaay too expensive for the value. Games like smite, paladins  (yeah same company I know) charge around 3 or 4 usd for each skin and most of them have customized voice lines (they pay a ton of voice actors), abilities etc.
I do love overwatch but I don't think these new expansions are worth 15$ or 40$, it's just some maps that are already in the game in addition of mobs and stuff to kill and some cringy voice lines from the heroes. I still don't know if I will buy the DLC, I truly enjoy the game but their prices are in the roof, it is even more expensive to buy this DLC in latin america than in the US, the 40 usd pack is around 50 usd in latin america.

16年刚出的时候马上就吸引到我了，虽然玩的第一个FPS游戏是腾讯的战地之王，第二个才是守望先锋。但第一台自组的电脑肯定是为了玩守望先锋的。那时候真是太爽了，简直是降维打击，无论是对旧电脑还是旧游戏。如果把游戏比作生命中遇到的异性，那守望先锋肯定是我的初恋没错的。而且不用表白，我买了他就是我对象了。然后就顺理成章的一谈谈了好几年，只记得16年6月30日晚上装完系统我很激动，啥也不下桌面下个战网直接守望先锋，启动了。第一次看到温斯顿号召还是很新鲜的，进靶场开的第一把游戏也都还记得，因为第一把玩的是源氏，看别人玩的又帅又强，其实自己上手路都走不明白。于是我从辅助开始从卢西奥开始，那个夏天玩的是最菜的但也是最快乐的，因为有朋友一起，真的好多人在玩，六排太理所当然了。后来才慢慢在快速练了一手源氏，玩的多了就像是突然开窍了一样，我能C了！第二个夏天我已经能带人乱杀了，也因此交了好多朋友。这种感觉太爽了，受到夸赞太开心了！这种状态一直持续到了20年3月，感情一直持续上升了四年，20年3月出的归来CG更是一下上升到最高点。随后出的回声更是让我在国服普遍98甚至免费送的情况下直接再花198注册亚服账号，只是为了玩一下测试服回声，毕竟是大更新前最后一个英雄。谁想到最高点就是这了，之后整整两年再也没有更新，加上大学垃圾校园网休闲了两年就像是老夫老妻没有x生活一样感情慢慢就平淡了。22年10月守望先锋归来！两年了终于更新，在10月份点燃了一波仿佛是回到了16年夏天，但是热度降得很快，甚至在之后莫名就宣布国服停服倒计时。本以为10月像是新的开端一样，本以为是老当益壮，结果10月像走马灯一样给守望2玩家快速回放了一遍守望从16年到20年后就直接把自己药死了。说难受倒也不至于，说不难受可是之后我再也没玩过其他FPS，到现在甚至游戏都很少玩了。20年到22年被消耗的也差不多了，本来就只差临门一脚。可归来后就像是拉上悬崖又把我踹下去一样，至此彻底凉透了。于是今天好啊让你个byd给我碰到了，现在终于轮到我来反踩一脚了。你****的垃圾暴雪赶紧死一死

Overwatch is a pretty fun game to play.  It is not quite as good as Team Fortress 2, but it is certainly up there.  The main problem I have with Overwatch would be Blizzard itself.  Valve has allowed bots to swarm the servers of TF2 for years, sure, but that is nowhere near as bad as the predatory marketing tactics employed by Blizzard, such as making the new heroes overpowered and locked behind the battle pass (except Lifeweaver) and having a single semi good skin cost 20 dollars.  They also raise the prices of skins in the shop, then apply a discount to make it seem like a good deal, when in fact you are paying the same amount of money.  

It is fun to play, but I think either management or the buissness department could use some reshuffling.  The developers of the mechanics, however, are doing a solid 7.5/10 job, and I think they should just get a bit better at balancing heroes.  Otherwise, they are fine.  

Maybe a TF2 Overwatch crossover would be cool, with an engineer skin for Torb and the likes.  

Medic is also far more attractive than Mercy, which is why I have over 300 hours on Medic, but only 22 on Mercy.

Playing on the steam deck. It's honestly a nightmare. Graphics are good, game is good when it works. But certain modes won't allow me to use my xbox controller. Others will let me play til i die the first time, after that the controller stops working. Same goes for my mouse half the time. I've tried configuring several settings in both ow2 menu and the steam deck menu, but nothing has worked yet.  It's the most frustrating experience right now. OW2 monetization as a whole needs a lot of work too. Thank god the game is free now. Hopefully this controller issue is fixed soon. Not sure if its on the valve team or the battlenet team, but if you're playing on the steam deck, good luck.
